item.title: Raichur farmer suffers injuries in crocodile attack
item.description:
<![CDATA[RAICHUR: A farmer from Sarjapur in the district was attacked by a crocodile while bathing his oxen in a lake in Raichur. The farmer Mahananda, who suffered serious injuries in his right leg, is currently undergoing treatment at a private hospital in Raichur.
After the incident, Forest Department officials launched an operation caught the crocodile with the help of local villagers. The crocodile has been relocated to a safe place.
However, villagers are still worried as they suspect that two mo...]]>

item.title: Lover Slits College Student's Throat After She Refuses To Marry Him In Karnataka
item.description:
<![CDATA[In a shocking incident, a jilted lover brutally killed a college student in broad daylight by slitting her throat after she refused to marry him in Raichur district, Karnataka.
The accused has surrendered to the police after committing the crime.
The student who died has been identified as Shifa (24), while the accused is Mubin, a worker at a tile shop. The incident took place within the jurisdiction of the Sindhanoor Town police station.
Police said that Shifa, who was pursuing an MSc at a p...]]>
